Pensando en ti
                                             


                        1ª Parte de voz

Deja que te cuente…
deja que te diga…
que tengo miedo de volver.

Aunque yo te quiera…
aunque seas mi vida…
sólo me acuerdo del ayer.

Estribillo general

Cuando tus miradas eran distintas,
cuando tus palabras me hacían sufrir,
cuando por tenerte hubiese dado mi vida,
cuando te alejabas poco a poco de mi.

Ahora estas solo y gritas al cielo
que tu sin mis besos no sabes vivir,
mas quiero que sepas que todo este tiempo
ha sido un infierno y que vivo tan solo…. pensando en ti.

2ª Parte de voz

Si al final volvemos
no será lo mismo,
hemos cambiado yo lo sé.

Razones que no cesan,
besos compartidos
y miedos que vuelven a nacer…..

You don’t want secrets and you don’t want lies,
Don’t want what’s on my mind.
Try to put it all together but you can’t yet,
Cause what is love but a moving target.

Verse 2:

All I wanted were open doors.
Disaster disaster,

Don’t try to resist it,
A charmed life but a perilous existence,
The bitter medicines and breakable ties,
All live in the shifting distance.

Chorus

Lyrics – Our First Kiss

1. I’ve been dreaming of you so much,
and dreaming of our first touch, The
way you slipped your hand in mine,
as our souls gently entwined.

2. Then you opened your bright eyes,
as I looked so deep into your soul,
I could see your beauty within,
like the beauty of your fine skin.

3. I thought angels only lived in heaven,
but now there’s one in my arms.
I didn’t know what to say,
I case I frighten you away.

4. I never knew a love like this,
as I waiting for our first kiss.
then you drew your lips so close to mine,
with a kiss so divine.

5. With your warm face touching mine,
you whispered words so heavenly,
with a voice just meant for me,
full of love and sincerity.

6. What is happening to me?
is this some silly dream?
will I suddenly awake?
to find it’s some silly mistake?

7. As you cuddled close to me,
your warm soft body comforts me,
I could feel your strong heart beat,
with a rhythm so sweet.

8. Then your perfume filled the air,
as you gently touched my hair,
combing all my fears away,
so no more tears for yesterday.

9. Why does my heart still miss a beat,
each time we meet or speak,
and when your not with here me,
I am lost and feel so empty.

10. I was just about to speak,
as a tear rolled down your cheek,
and when you said you had to go,
was like loosing my own soul.

11. Then you said with a warm smile,
it will only be for a short while,
and soon you’ll be back with me,
and will stay for eternity.

12. I thought angels only lived in heaven,
but now you’re here in my arms.
I will make you so happy,
and safe from all life’s harms.

13. And when we’re old and grey
we’ll remember how we feel today,
with our children by our side,
full of love and full of pride.

14. And when its time to go to heaven,
holding hands we’ll go together,
our true love will see us through,
we’ll be will be just me and you.

15. And what I will remember is
the memory of our first kiss.
as you drew your lips so close to mine.
with a kiss so divine,
